description: This Java source file defines the class 'deviceCommunicationFailedEvent', which extends the 'Event' class. It models an event indicating failure in device communication, identified by its EUI64 address.

classes.name: deviceCommunicationFailedEvent
classes.description: A class representing a device communication failure event, storing the EUI64 identifier of the device.

methods.name: deviceCommunicationFailedEvent
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the event with the given EUI64 address.

methods.name: getEui64
methods.description: Returns the EUI64 address associated with the failed communication event.
